title: I have purchased Google pixel 3 in January'19 , 3 times to service center, results: scratches on pho
content:
Dear sir/ madam, I have purchased Google pixel 3 in January'19, since then I have sent it to your service center thrice, while sending it, your person told me to remove screen guard from phone I did the same , n now the phone has scratches on it, it is 64k phone, I am using a phone given by you that is Nexus, in this phone also problem has started coming, I am facing many problems because of phone, it's a request to give my money back so that I can purchase a new phone or give me a new device, it's already 1 month to this problem no action is taken by you.
Kindly feel the situation of the customer and hope you will take action as soon as possible
Regards
Vaishali
